name: Walla-Bye Baby (Beta Release)
description:
Walla-Bye Baby:

This is a Frogger/Donkey Kong type VR adaptation. You will play as a Wallaby trying to free your baby from some evil Dingoes (Dingoes ate my baby). This is a simple game for beginners to VR using thumb stick movement, teleportation and snap turn for the game play. The player must avoid the obstacles while trying to catch the dingoes. These obstacles include such things as cars, tigers, crocodiles, and the dingoes themselves. You will have to go through different levels that will include towns, desert, woods, swamp, and even the Dingo Cave. The dingoes took your baby now it is time to get it back.  If you would like to participate in the official Beta test group on the Meta Hub, please let me know and I will add you to the Beta test group.
